Summary: two people viewed dim triangle outline of lights/south to north very fast very big
divs: sighting detailswife and i in hot tub about 10 minutes to 9 at night ,clear sky, watching venus... we spotted dim triangle light outline traveling very fast south to north ..very surprizing..very fast moving....1\2 of the sky in 15 sec. we were at home in vero beach fl....planes are always in the air in vero there was one right before we spotted the dim cheveron ,triangle, boomerang looking thing.appeared to be huge and faster then the space shuttle by far, look you guys we dont care i'm just telling you... i quickly looked at the time aprox8:52pm 03-28-2012,checked the angle in the sky 45 deg. to the west. got out of hot tub to watch it as far as i could as it flew out of view to the north just then the light pattern seemed to flash bright but i couldnt swear to that because that could have been just the air at great distance....k ? call me if you want 7724106218 russell .... thank you guys for all your hard work and patience.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Vero Beach
There were no other sightings in Vero Beach on or around March 28th 2012
